title: sharing ui unusable in mobilesafari
body:
### expected behaviour
mobilesafari users should be able to download/view shared files.

### actual behaviour
when sharing a folder by link, using the ui on mobile safari is impossible. 
when i try clicking on a file name or "download" link, the shaded bar jumps up or down one or two rows (varies) at a time, and the download is not initiated. touching the link for a longer interval and selecting "open in new tab" does not work either.
the only file that can be downloaded via the ui is the first file in the list. 

### steps to reproduce
1. share a folder with more than 1 file by link
2. open link with mobilesafari
3. become frustrated and use gallery to show baby pictures.

### server configuration
operating system: linux

web server: apache2

database: sqlite

php version: 5.4.4-14+deb7u5

owncloud version: 5.0.12

### client configuration
browser: 
mozilla/5.0 (ipad; cpu os 7_0_2 like mac os x) applewebkit/537.51.1 (khtml, like gecko) version/7.0 mobile/11a501 safari/9537.53

operating system: ios 7.0.2 on ipad3
